All corresponding stops will be made along the detoured route.

NJDOT CONSTRUCTION | Through Summer 2021
Staten Island Express buses using the Lincoln Tunnel may experience delays


The New Jersey Department of Transportation will conduct a major construction project that will impact Staten Island express buses using the Lincoln Tunnel. We are working to provide the best service possible during this disruption, but travel times may be longer as a result.

line.name: Robert F. Kennedy
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 12/05/2018  7:48AM

RFK- DISABLED VEHICLE: QUEENS SPAN; BRONX/MANHATTN BOUND ONE LANE BLOCKED. MOTORIST ARE ADVISED TO ALLOW FOR EXTRA TRAVEL TIME.

Service Change  Posted: 11/30/2018  7:24PM

RFK Bridge: Manhattan-Bound. A long-term traffic pattern changeis in effect at the RFK Bridge's Manhattan Plaza area (Manhattan-bound) toaccommodate roadway deck replacement. Allthree travel lanes to Manhattan on the RFK Harlem river span will be maintained.  Motorists coming from Queens and theBronx toward Manhattan should allow for additional travel time or consider analternate route.

line.name: Harlem

Harlem Line service is currently experiencing delays of up to 10 minutes due to a track condition requiring attention in the vicinity of Fleetwood. Please listen for announcements at your station.

line.name: Pascack Valley
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 10/15/2018  3:18PM

PASCACK VALLEY LINE TRAINS TEMPORARILY DISCONTINUED Effective Immediately


INBOUND
Train 1618, the 7:59 a.m. departure from Spring Valley to Hoboken. (Metro-North express)
.Earlier option departs Spring Valley at 7:37 a.m.
.Train 1620 moves 5 minutes earlier to depart Spring Valley 4 minutes later than the discontinued 1618.  Metro-North customers arrive in Hoboken 13 minutes later than the current 1618.

OUTBOUND
Train 1639, the 7:20 p.m. departure (M-TH) from Hoboken to Spring Valley (Metro-North express)
.Earlier option departs at 6:48 p.m.
.Later option departs at 7:29 p.m.

Note: Train 9653 which currently operates only on Friday afternoons and before specific holidays (departing Hoboken at 2:58 p.m.) will operate only on 11/21, 12/21.  On those dates, Train 1633 (departing Hoboken at 5:58 p.m.) will not operate.

Please visit njtransit.com/ptc for project updates and a complete list of service adjustments by rail line.

Important Note: Customers are strongly encouraged to view the full rail timetables for all travel options as schedule adjustments, including departure/arrival times and station stops, will be made throughout the system.

We apologize for any inconvenience, and thank you for your patience.  For information and language assistance, please call NJ TRANSIT Customer Service at (973) 275-5555 between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and 5 p.m. daily.

line.name: Port Jervis
line.text:
